main event: A flying disc was located in Shreveport, Louisiana, on 7 July 1947, which was later determined to be a hoax.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing the disc whirling through the air, emitting smoke and fire., The object was described as an aluminum disc, approximately 16 inches in diameter, with coils and wires attached., The individual responsible for the disc admitted it was a practical joke intended for his boss., The investigation was discontinued when it was confirmed that the disc incident was only a practical joke., The FBI was notified following the sighting, and they confirmed it was a hoax.
witness description: A civilian who reported seeing the disc fall from the sky and subsequently notified Army Officials.
